devdoc.details: This contract provides utility functions for retrieving information and calculating fees related to stable swaps with three coins.

params._swap: Address of the stable swap contract
Address of the stable swap contract

params._balances: The array of balances to calculate virtual balances from.

params._swap: Address of the stable swap contract

params._amount: Amount of LP tokens to burn in the withdrawal
params._swap: Address of the stable swap contract

params._balances: Array of balances to calculate virtual balances from.

params._swap: Address of the stable swap contract
params.amounts: Array of amounts for each coin being deposited

params._swap: Address of the stable swap contract
params.amounts: Array of amounts for each coin being deposited

params._swap: Address of the stable swap contract
params.dx: Amount of token to swap from
params.i: Index of the token to swap from
params.j: Index of the token to swap to

params._swap: Address of the stable swap contract
params.amounts: Array of amounts for each coin being withdrawn

params._swap: Address of the stable swap contract
params._token_amount: Amount of liquidity tokens being withdrawn
params.i: Index of the coin to withdraw

params._swap: Address of the stable swap contract

devdoc.title: StableSwapThreePoolInfo

PRECISION_MUL(address).notice: Get the precision multipliers for each coin in the pool

RATES(address).notice: Get the exchange rates for each coin in the pool

_xp_mem(address,uint256[3]).notice: Calculates the array of virtual balances for the pool, scaled by precision, using provided balances.

balances(address).notice: Get the balances of each coin in the pool

calc_coins_amount(address,uint256).notice: Calculate the amount of each coin received when removing liquidity

get_D_mem(address,uint256[3],uint256).notice: Calculates the total value of the pool's assets (invariant D), given balances and amplification factor.

get_add_liquidity_fee(address,uint256[3].notice: Calculate the fee charged when adding liquidity

get_add_liquidity_mint_amount(address,ui.notice: Calculate the amount of LP token received when adding liquidity

get_dx(address,uint256,uint256,uint256,u.notice: get amountIn  with the given amount out

get_exchange_fee(address,uint256,uint256.notice: Calculates the exchange fee and admin fee for a token swap

get_remove_liquidity_imbalance_fee(addre.notice: Calculate the fee charged when removing liquidity

get_remove_liquidity_one_coin_fee(addres.notice: Calculate the fee charged when removing liquidity for a single coin

token(address).notice: Get the LP token of the two pool

userdoc.notice: Contract for retrieving information about stable swaps with three coins
